summary: A dataset class that lazily extracts fixed-size patches from whole‑slide images at a specified pyramid level, optionally includes associated class labels and metadata, and applies user‑defined transforms using a configurable WSI reader.
business_intent: Enable efficient training and evaluation of deep‑learning models on large pathology or medical whole‑slide images by providing patch‑level inputs with correct labeling and preprocessing without loading the entire image into memory.
